Kid's Zone

Learn all about animals close to extinction and how you can do your part to help and have fun doing it too. Help Us Save The Animals!!!

Feed the giraffes - Family Fun

If you are looking for an amazing fun day out with the family then Jem Zoo is where the fun's at. Our facilities are 100% family friendly and all are welcome.

Our Animals

We currently have over 60 animals at JEM ZOO from animal groups Amphibians, Reptiles, Birds and Mammals.

Become A Jem Zoo Member

By becoming a member you can visit the zoo all year round. Discover everything Jem Zoo has to offer, it's a gift that just keeps on giving! Get exclusive discounts and offers.
